participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily enjoys engaging in activities that allow her to express herself artistically. She is also attentive and caring towards her loved ones.
participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i've a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. i like to watch nhl hockey. i enjoy coloring books.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Jordan is always eager to connect with others and pursue new opportunities. He has a passion for music and sports.
participant_2.background: i have one older sister. my favourite artist is travis scott. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. my mother is a dentist. i like playing basketball.
